哎.definition: hey!; (interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)

哎呀.definition: interjection of wonder, shock or admiration

哎呦.definition: (interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc); Oh my!; Uh-oh!; Ah!; Ouch!

哎唷.definition: interjection of pain or surprise; also written 哎喲|哎哟

哎喲.definition: hey; ow; ouch; interjection of pain or surprise
